Like Counter-Strike, but with more Source

8.1/10

This game is Counter-Strike 1.6 updated with the source engine for better grafix and modability to give it even better grafix. In this installment of the franchise is mostly for little kids wanting to play Gmod. There are a lot of hackers on here FYI they won't steal you interwebs but they will make the gameplay less enjoyable. This game can run on pretty crap systems at decent settings to be fooled by the System minimums that valve sets. I really enjoy this game because it sticks to the barebone roots of Counter-Strike goodness, which set the standard for most modern day shooters. you can git gud really easy on here but there is no ranking system and no match making, just join a server, play, and enjoy~

     Still good in 2017.

Other than really needing this game to play with your freinds of Gmod. You should try and play CSS itself. There are still servers up and running, but beware there are some servers that promote hacking. This game can be fun but at times excruciatingly difficult, especially when the bots are on easy and can somehow see you through 4 walls, I urge everyone who has this game to play it with bots on Hard just to see how boned you can be whilst playing this.

ЗАХОДИШЬ НА РАНДОМНЫЙ СЕРВЕр
НАЧИНАЕТСЯ ЗАГРУЗКА ГИГАБАЙТА СКИНОВ, ЗВУКОВ АДА И АЛЛАХА
СПУСТЯ ЧАС С АНАЛЬНЫМ НАПРЯЖЕНИЕМ ПРИСОЕДИНЯЕШЬСЯ К ИГРЕ
ТЕБЯ ВСТРЕЧАЕТ САМЫЙ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ КЛУБНЯЧОК И РЕМИКСЫ ДОРНА
СМЕНИВ КРЕСЛО НА АЙСБЕРГ, ТЫ ЗАХОДИШЬ ЗА ТЕРРОВ
ВМЕСТО СТАНДАРТНЫХ МОДЕЛЕЙ ВЕЗДЕ БЕГАЮТ СТЕТХЭМЫ, БЭТМЕНЫ, ЖЕЛЕЗНЫЕ ЧЕЛОВЕКИ И ПРОЧИЕ ИДОЛЫ ШКОЛОАДМИНА
♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ ЕЛЕ СДЕРЖИВАЕТСЯ ОТ ДЕТОНАЦИИ, НО ТЫ НЕ ЛИВАЕШЬ С СЕРВАКА
ВИЗГИ ШКОЛЬНИКОВ ИЗ КОЛОНОК НЕ ПРЕКРАЩАЮТСЯ, ОНИ ВСЕ ВРЕМЯ ОРУТ ПРО РАШ ПО ЦЕНТРУ
ВЫКИНУВ НАХРЕН КОЛОНКИ, ПРОДОЛЖАЕШЬ ИГРУ
ЗАКУПАЕШЬСЯ СИГОМ ,БРОНЕЖИЛЕТОМ И ФЛЭХОЙ - ВСЕМ, ЧТО НУЖНО ДЛЯ ТАЩЕРСТВА
НО 15 СТЕТХЕМОВ С АВП ВСЕ ЖЕ СОВЕРШАЮТ РАШ ПО ЦЕНТРУ, ЮЗАЯ ПАРАШЮТЫ (ЩИТО?
АДМИН СО СКИНОМ ГАЯ ФОКСА УБИВАЕТ ВСЕХ В МЯСО ДОНАТЕРСКОЙ ЭМКОЙ
УСПрВАЕШЬ ПОСТАВИТЬ БОМБУ В "В"
УСТРАИВАШЬ ЗАСАДУ НА ДЖЕНТЛЬМЕНА С УСИКАМИ
ВИДИШЬ, КАК ЭТОТ ФИЛАСАФ ЛЕТАЕТ ПО ВСЕЙ КАРТЕ НА ДЖЕТПАКЕ, НЕ ПОНИМАЯ С КАКОЙ СТОРОНЫ ПИЩИТ БОМБА
ЗА НЕСКОЛЬКО МЕТКИХ ВЫСТРЕЛОВ ВАЛИШЬ ЕГО В ХЭД И ВЫИГРЫВАЕШЬ РАУНД - ДАЖЕ НЕБО, ДАЖЕ ВП ЗАВИДУЮТ ТВОЕМУ СКИЛЛУ

Com certeza um excelentíssimo FPS e sem dúvida nenhuma um ótimo jogo da VALVE. Ele é "apenas" um remake do Counter-Strike 1.6, porém passa muito adiante de ser apenas um remake e se torna um jogo que conquistou suas características próprias. A comunidade dele é simplesmente perfeita; os gráficos são até hoje, para mim, bonitos e. o principal, a diversão nesse jogo é garantida. O único ponto negativo é que, atualmente, os servidores brasileiros se encontram muito limitados a somente um modo de jogo: Mata mata em Dust 2. Mas ainda é possível encontrar alguns servers gringos de objetivo. Adoro esse jogo de paixão :)
Офигенная игрушка)!

Downvoted only due to the following:

The practice of paying for mods is antithetical to the nature of the modding community; an optional "DONATION" button is not (Just like on the Nexus http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/? ). Was a fun game, The fact that Valve is doing this and that Bethesda is endorsing it and they both taking the largest share of the modders' work is American Corporate greed at it's finest.

Take something artistic and done for the love of the subject matter, monetize it, then allow the accountants to define art as widgets, and then creativity is now run by the mercantile class, the middle men, who are "America Corporates".

If they had any integrity and decency, any moneys brought in, at the very least, should be 100% donated to charities on behalf off the modding community in conjunction with Valve or Bethesda or whomever. See Gaben, you don't need the cash grab, you can win by getting good press which in the long run would do better for you to show you are not like EA et al.

Counter Strike: Source is the classic game that I never grew up with. The game is pretty good when people don't bully you for being "CS:GO fanboy". 

Pros:
+You can B-Hop
+You don't have to be skilled to enjoy this game
+You get a flashlight

Cons
-No skins
-No zeus
-No riot Sheilds
-No matchmaking

As you can see there is not much wrong with this game.

Counter Strike Source is the awkward middle child in a series of games trying to be realistic shooters which subscribe to FPS Fallacy, thereby defeating the point. If you're unaware, FPS Fallacy stipulates that:

-If you move even slightly, your gun cannot hit anything, regardless of its typical accuracy or supposed proficiency with the gun
-Every gun is uncontrollable if fired in more than semi-auto.
-Crouching increases accuracy.
There's more to it than that, such as guns being literally unable to hit anything if you don't squint and look at the sights, but that doesn't apply here. It also has an armor system wherein each gun penetrates armor a certain amount, some completely canceling it and the entire point of armor. Of course, if you've played CS, then you know armor is essentially useless, arguably letting you tank one more shot, which won't matter 99% of the time.

On top of that, Counter Strike's signature AWP is blatantly overpowered. Don't believe me? I've picked it up in DM servers and top scored just for using it, where switching to an assault rifle was iffier because they barely do any damage unless they're an AK, and even then, it really depended on who saw who first, not player skill. This game disrespects the time put in, calls its own mechanics into question, and punishes you for playing the game, effectively. And going back to the AWP for a moment, it has 10 rounds per magazine. You might say, "oh, it's balanced by high price and bolt action," but it cycles reasonably fast, can kill just fine if you no-scope, and it won't matter when you're winning, because then you're earning more money than your enemy in the first place by a good margin. On top of that, the community is as toxic as it gets, which CS is infamous for.

Counter Strike has always been shit, and this is no different. Fuck this failure of programming and all its franchise siblings.
